meanings.definition: A young woman, especially one who is stylish and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: The deb wore a trendy dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the most fashionable deb in town.
meanings.sent3: The deb's stylish hat caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense makes her stand out like a deb in a crowd of plain clothes.
meanings.sent5: The deb's outfit was so chic, it was hard to look away.

meanings.sent1: I deb my friend ten dollars for lunch.
meanings.sent2: He debbed me for the concert tickets we bought.
meanings.sent3: I always seem to deb money to my siblings.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of debting money to others can be stressful.
meanings.sent5: Remember to deb your dues on time to avoid any issues.

meanings.definition: A formal discussion on a particular matter in a public meeting or legislative assembly.
meanings.sent1: The deb on the new policy lasted for hours.
meanings.sent2: The deb in the parliament was intense and informative.
meanings.sent3: During the deb, the members presented their arguments passionately.
meanings.sent4: The deb resembled a chess match with each side strategizing their moves.
meanings.sent5: The deb left a lasting impact on the attendees with its insightful discussions.
